title: Implement a new feature for user account management
roi_reason: This feature could potentially increase user engagement and retention, but its impact on revenue directly is not as significant as other features such as improved search functionality or real-time notifications.
effort_reason: Implementing a new feature requires time for development, testing, and deployment, especially if it involves integrating with other systems or creating new user interfaces.

title: Add real-time notifications to the app
roi_reason: Real-time notifications can drive immediate engagement and potentially lead to increased transactions or subscriptions, making it a valuable investment. However, the exact ROI will depend on the specific use case and audience behavior.
effort_reason: Developing real-time notifications requires integrating with push notification services, designing relevant content, and setting up triggers based on user actions or behaviors within the app.

title: Improve search functionality
roi_reason: A more efficient search function can significantly improve user experience, making it easier for users to find what they're looking for and increasing the likelihood of them making a purchase or completing other desired actions.
effort_reason: Improving search functionality involves understanding user behavior, designing an effective search algorithm, and ensuring its integration with various parts of the application for optimal results. This can be resource-intensive and time-consuming.
